recipes.name: Lemon Tiramis√∫
instructions: Combine sugar and lemon juice with water in a pot and let it simmer for 5 minutes
Whip heavy cream with vanilla sugar
Combine whipped cream with Mascarpone and Powdered Sugar
Add first layer of lady fingers to a casserole dish and spread lemon syrup
Add a layer of cream, followed by a thin layer of lemon curd
Add a layer of lady fingers dipped in syrup
Mix the remaining lemon curd with the remaining cream and add it as the final layer
Use remaining cream and lemons to decorate as desired
Refridgerate for at least 60 mins, or over night
